user_instruction: 'Send an update to Ms. Richardson (angela.richardson@zenithglobal.com) about how the wellness program is going. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Wellness Program Details for Ms. Richardson’s Update  

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Ms. Richardson would like an updated summary of the wellness program’s current status. Could you please:

• Add the latest participation metrics, key milestones, and any notable employee feedback to the Wellness Program dashboard in Notion, or  
• Point me to the most recent pages/sections that already contain this information?

If possible, please have the details ready (or confirm where they are) by the end of the day so I can compile the update and send it to Ms. Richardson promptly.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
